net.happybrackets.rendererengine

Class RendererController

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.happybrackets.rendererengine.RendererController

  • public class RendererController
extends java.lang.Object
    The RendererController manages the instantiated Renderer in the device. It only adds Renderer if the Renderer.hostname matches the device hostname. It contains an internal clock internalClock that will be used by the Renderers. This class processes the Java Annotations that are added to any sketch that extender Renderer. Annotations available: HBCommand, HBParam and HBNumberRange. Check the example at the HappyBrackets Plugin default project on examples/rendererengine/renderer

    • Nested Class Summary

      static class  RendererController.EightLEDsMode
      In the RendererController you can choose the mode of operation to work with the Biotica Media Pixel Firmware.

      • addRenderer

        public Renderer addRenderer(Renderer.Type type,
                            java.lang.String hostname,
                            float x,
                            float y,
                            float z,
                            java.lang.String name,
                            int id)
        Add a Renderer to the Renderer list of this singleton RendererController. The Renderer will only be effectively added if hostname is the same as the current device hostname. Exception if running as UNITY mode.
        Parameters:
        type - Renderer type
        hostname - device hostname
        x - x position
        y - y position
        z - z position
        name - Renderer name
        id - Renderer id
        Returns:
        Renderer object

      • loadHardwareConfiguration

        public void loadHardwareConfiguration(java.lang.String filepath,
                                      RendererController.RenderMode renderMode)
        Loads a CSV files containing the hardware configuration of a certain exibition. Required CSV columns: PParent,Parent,Device ID,ObjectName,x,y,z,stripSize
        Parameters:
        filepath - location of the csv file
        renderMode - mode of rendering: Local or Unity RendererController.RenderMode
